DOC.criteria: In order eligible participate study , subject must meet following criterion : Provide sign date informed consent form Be age 18 old Be willing comply study procedure available duration study Be able read English 8th grade level ( determined physician ) Have internet access email computer and/or tablet Patients exclude study participation meet follow criterion : Inability provide consent due guardianship issue Currently experience psychotic symptom ( determined physician ) Anything , opinion Investigator , would preclude subject 's full compliance completion study .
